name: Chatham Lodging Trust
description: Chatham Lodging Trust is a real estate investment trust (REIT) that focuses on investing in premium-branded hotels in major metropolitan markets and coastal destinations. Founded in 2010 and headquartered in West Palm Beach, Florida, Chatham Lodging Trust seeks to generate attractive risk-adjusted returns by acquiring, developing, and managing a diverse portfolio of hotels. The company primarily invests in upscale, extended-stay hotels and premium-branded select-service hotels, which cater to both business and leisure travelers. Chatham's strategy involves enhancing the value of its properties through strategic renovations and operational improvements. The company is committed to sustainability and prioritizes environmentally friendly practices across its portfolio. Chatham Lodging Trust operates properties under well-known brands including Marriott, Hilton, and Hyatt, ensuring a high level of service and quality for guests. With a focus on long-term growth and value creation, Chatham Lodging Trust aims to deliver consistent and sustainable distributions to its shareholders, while also being active in the communities where it operates.
